sub_title: Area Visual Manager Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg at GUESS?, Inc.
summary:
Area Visual Manager with more than 8 years experience in visual merchandising, I have worked in both fast fashion and premium industries. Currently responsible for the roll-out of the visual merchandising strategy across Benelux area for both full price & outlets stores in order to achieve high VM standards and consistency.

AREA OF EXPERTISE
-Creating and implementing Visual Guidelines
-Collaboration with Switzerland home office team
-Driving strategy through creativity
-Driving KPIs through VM
-Training and development
-Planning and execution
-Commercial decision making
-Sell down solutions
-Styling
-Reporting and commercial analysis

SKILLS 
-Superior verbal, non verbal, interpersonal and intercultural communication
-Superior creative thinking and execution 
-Superior analytical thinking and attention to detail
-Proficient user in, Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint ,intermediate user in Adobe Suite
